Package org.codehaus.mojo.versions.change

package org.codehaus.mojo.versions.change
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractVersionChanger
    Abstract base class for VersionChanger implementations.
    CompositeVersionChanger
    A composite version changer, which chains version changers together and executes the chain in CompositeVersionChanger.apply(DependencyVersionChange) until an exception occurs or the chain is through.
    DefaultDependencyVersionChange
    Represents a change of an artifact's version.
    DefaultPropertyVersionChange
    Represents a change of a property value
    DependencyVersionChanger
    A VersionChanger implementation that changes dependency versions.
    ParentVersionChanger
    A VersionChanger implementation that changes dependency versions.
    PluginVersionChanger
    A VersionChanger implementation that changes plugin versions.
    ProjectVersionChanger
    A VersionChanger implementation that changes dependency versions.
    VersionChanger
    Describes an operation that can change the version of a dependency in a POM.
    VersionChangerFactory
    Factory for creating VersionChanger instances.
